Articles.Content:
Not sure where to post this, so if it's in the wrong section my bad.

I seem to be constantly losing my post history and thread history as seen on my profile(and other profiles as well). they seem to save only post in the last 24 hours. It's hard to keep track of threads that I've commented to and trying to view old posts, Although it's not much big of a problem. Is this a known issue or 'feature' of the forums?

Edited December 30, 2014 by lyndonguitar
Your profile -> find latest posts (or threads). The main view is only for recent activity.

Your profile -> find latest posts (or threads). The main view is only for recent activity.

Oh thanks about that, it's been a long time, I forgot, silly me

Sorry for the bother guys
